Actions.Text: REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Relates to rights of sexual offense victims; repealer
Summary: Relates to rights of sexual offense victims; provides that sexual offense victims shall be informed that a rape crisis or victim assistance organization is available to provide victims with transportation from a medical facility.
LawCode: Rpld ยง631-b, Exec L (as proposed in S.3966-A & A.5775-A); amd ยง2805-i, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to rights of sexual offense victims; and to repeal section 631-b of the executive law relating thereto
